name: MMPR Marketing
description:
MMPR Marketing is a full-service PR & Marketing agency specializing in content marketing, branding, social media, advertising, and public relations.  Our goal is simple: through carefully laid plans, we want to positively affect your business in ways you never considered, elevating your visibility, enhancing your brand, and increasing your bottom line in the process.
  Our carefully curated roster of clients is as diverse as our background, and spans industries ranging from construction, development, health, beauty, and nonprofit to entertainment and hospitality.  Our in-house team is chock full of talent, from social media strategists and graphic designers, to copywriters and marketing savants. Our team offers industry-leading skills in a highly competitive climate by maintaining a passion for results-oriented campaigns.  Integrity, enthusiasm and strategic, savvy marketing is the name of our game, and we’ve been Arizona’s premier marketing agency for over 20 years.
